```{r}
library(tidyverse)

epa_cars <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-10-15/big_epa_cars.csv") %>%
  mutate_all(~ ifelse(. == -1, NA, .)) %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
```

```{r}
epa_cars %>% count(fe_score, sort = TRUE)
```
